subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bryan Mitchell was hit in the face with a line drive off the bat of Eduardo Nunez, who, in an odd twist, handed the Yankees a victory when he mishandled a bases-loaded grounder in the 10th.
snippet: Bryan Mitchell was hit in the face with a line drive off the bat of Eduardo Nunez, who, in an odd twist, handed the Yankees a victory when he mishandled a bases-loaded grounder in the 10th.
